originalText.text: I would give no stars if possible. I gave them more than four months try, and tried many many times to talk to someone who’s really knowledgeable about the lab work orders, and how things need to be corrected properly to avoid any further lab mess. Things got worse and worse over time, and in some situations when they don’t have a legitimate reason to justify their mistakes, they start pointing fingers to get themselves off the hook. Customer service is horrible as well. They used to keep my staff on hold for over 30 minutes even for simple requests. Other times they put the order on hold for a while with NO REASON. I highly don’t recommend this lab because you may lose your patients eventually because of their lousy work.

originalText.text: I really like this lab because they loan the computer and scanner everything for digital impression.  I like their software too.  Very well thought out and stream lined.  I like the crowns quality.  Strong recommendation

text.text: I really like this lab because they loan the computer and scanner everything for digital impression.  I like their software too.  Very well thought out and stream lined.  I like the crowns quality.  Strong recommendation

originalText.text:
Received crown from.Dandy Labs in February 2023 as my  Dentist put it in and 2 months later, the contact was noticed it was incorrect!  In the last 4 months 2 Incorrect  size and wrong color Crowns came from this lab.  The dental office sent it up 2 times, to the lab to remake the crown, and correct the wrong size, a molar, and they still sent it to Dental Practice WRONG! They made a bright white crown, and still too small.  After my dentist, took my crown off twice, the tooth fractured!  This cost me crown and a Root canal and loss of tooth! Do Not Use Dandy!  " 5  Months" of going through hell because Dandy sent both crowns wrong to my dental office!!! Now I have to purchase an implant.  Very upset!

*   Their digital scanner they used to measure/make the new crown didn't size it correctly. The old fashioned way of  making the mold is more accurate in just my opinion.  The crowns made are smaller and they didn't provide a snug fit " contact" close to the other teeth.

Received crown from.Dandy Labs in February 2023 as my  Dentist put it in and 2 months later, the contact was noticed it was incorrect!  In the last 4 months 2 Incorrect  size and wrong color Crowns came from this lab.  The dental office sent it up 2 times, to the lab to remake the crown, and correct the wrong size, a molar, and they still sent it to Dental Practice WRONG! They made a bright white crown, and still too small.  After my dentist, took my crown off twice, the tooth fractured!  This cost me crown and a Root canal and loss of tooth! Do Not Use Dandy!  " 5  Months" of going through hell because Dandy sent both crowns wrong to my dental office!!! Now I have to purchase an implant.  Very upset!

*   Their digital scanner they used to measure/make the new crown didn't size it correctly. The old fashioned way of  making the mold is more accurate in just my opinion.  The crowns made are smaller and they didn't provide a snug fit " contact" close to the other teeth.

originalText.text: Jonathan Luke has been my account manager for over a year and I have been very satisfied with the service he has provided to me and the quality of the lab.

text.text: Jonathan Luke has been my account manager for over a year and I have been very satisfied with the service he has provided to me and the quality of the lab.

originalText.text: Amazing customer support reps who want to encourage your practice to succeed. The Live Review feature by the dental lab techs is a great resource to get great feedback before submitting cases. Having this collaborative team support has been an overall positive experience.
